originalText.text: My experience with HDM has been absolutely flawless. From beginning to end, I felt like Max and the team really had a great understanding of what to prioritize when creating my EOY recap as a licensed real estate agent here in NYC. They were always on time, met every deadline early, always available to speak, and were also super flexible when it came to adjustments and edits to the final version of the video they created for me. It’s clear to me that they do not stop working until their client is 100% satisfied with the finished product. I would recommend HDM Edits for any realtor, entrepreneur, or business owner that wants to stand out from the crowd with outstanding marketing. 10/10 experience.

originalText.text: Max and his team are so professional and friendly! They are a group of young smart passionate and talented people! The context they produced for our aesthetic company was fantastic! His team also knew how to make you feel comfortable on camera which really reflected in the final product with each team member that was filmed appearing quite natural and at ease. Thank you again to Max and awesome crew!!!

originalText.text: Working with Max and his team has been a great experience. They are a group of talented, organized and efficient professionals. Their approach to video production beginning with a detailed overview and filming schedule to the day of the shoot was seamless. Despite a problem with one of the cameras during the shoot, the team created a series of engaging videos that showcase what we have to offer our clients. I highly recommend working with HDM Edits.

originalText.text: Max and the HDM team provide nothing but a professional and personalized high-quality experience. On top of superb video production, Max makes the filming process very comfortable and easy, even for those who aren't familiar with being in front of the camera.

text.text: Max and the HDM team provide nothing but a professional and personalized high-quality experience. On top of superb video production, Max makes the filming process very comfortable and easy, even for those who aren't familiar with being in front of the camera.

originalText.text: Max and his team at HDM are absolutely fantastic. Despite making some last minute changes (the night before our first day of shooting), Max was able to quickly redraft up shooting schedules, shot lists, and content timelines all while accommodating for a few extra talent. If you're looking for looking for a trustworthy, hardworking, and passionate team for content production, HDM Edits is where its at!!
